name: spiffy/spiffy-authorize
description: ZF2 authorization module for SpiffyCMS (can be used standalone).

suggest.zendframework/zend-authentication: >=2.2, to use the authentication identity provider
suggest.zendframework/zend-permissions-acl: >=2.2, For authorization using access control lists
suggest.zendframework/zend-permissions-rbac: >=2.2, For authorization using role-based access controler
